articles.description: Crypto rises with stocks after CPI falls again. Bitfinex BTC longs continue to grow. SUI again leads L1s, up 18%. FTX estate unstakes $24m SOL, still has $943m. Binance introduces SOL liquid staking. SWIFT introduces infrastructure for RWA transfers. Pendle launches Bitcoin yield pools. UK makes crypto legal property. India leads crypto adoption for second year. Vitalik won’t advertise L2s with multi-sig security. Based rollups seen as alternative future for ETH. Blockchain music start up raises $50m. Ford & Toyota file blockchain patents.

At least 5 massive SOL announcements coming: Mert. Binomial to introduce restaking on BNB. Indonesian exchange hacked for $22m. Atomic Wallet wins lawsuit over $100m hack. Lawyers argue Ellison shouldn’t go to jail. ENS integrated with Venmo & PayPal. Galaxy & State Street launch 3 crypto ETFs. Standard Chartered begins UAE crypto custody. AAVE leads resurgence in DeFi coins.

Wealth advisors quickly adopting BTC: BitWise CEO. Binance among few firms to get Indonesia license. Spot trading on CEXs up 30% in August. SEC made $4.68bn from crypto firms in 2023. $5.6bn lost to scams in 2023. XRP security status may be unchallenged in appeal. EtherFi announces credit card on Scroll. Base has more DEX users than other L2s combined. Tether & Tron create taskforce against crime. TIA still only making $585 in daily fees. WLD investigated by Singapore police.

BTC RSI hits lowest level since July 2021. Bitfinex longs continue to grow aggressively. BTC hashrate hits another ATH. BTC could hit $90k on Trump election: Bernstein. BlackRock settles intraday BTC trades off-chain. Spot BTC ETFs have been a failure: Bianco. Power giant Tepco explores Bitcoin mining. ETH Foundation & Vitalik continue to sell ETH. Farcaster DAU’s down 95%.

We’ve seen meme coins like Dogwifhat (WIF) soar to huge market caps and we’ve seen political meme coins crash as the candidate drops out (BODEN). Liu explains the data behind all of this.

articles.description: Crypto falls on macro wobble, Yen fears. OI wiped in BTC drop to $56k, funding negative. Altcoins down 13% YTD, stablecoin supply up 30%. VC funding & BTC correlation breaks down. We have entered crypto’s ‘corporate phase’. Gensler will leave regardless of election: Ripple CEO. Harris campaign has asked Coinbase for advice. Penpie DeFi project hacked for $27m. Galois Capital settles with SEC over FTX custody.

Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the cryptocurrency market continues to experience fluctuations, Helium (HNT), once a high-performing token in the Solana (SOL) ecosystem, has recently lost its upward momentum. Over the past week, Helium (HNT) has seen a 3.11% decline, leaving investors frustrated with stagnant portfolio growth. In contrast, GoodEgg (GEGG) has emerged as a top choice for those seeking explosive growth potential, drawing attention from across the crypto community.
 
Helium’s Performance Amidst Market Uncertainty 
The Helium (HNT) token has experienced its fair share of highs and lows this year. As a major player in the decentralized public infrastructure (DePIN) sector, Helium aims to revolutionize internet access by leveraging blockchain technology. Despite these lofty goals, Helium has struggled to mai…
articles.title: Helium HNT Drops 3.11% Leaving Investors Portfolio’s Stagnant, GoodEgg Becomes Top Pick for Explosive Growth Potential

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency world is constantly evolving, but it’s rare to see a presale generate the same kind of excitement as GoodEgg (GEGG). With its unique combination of AI-powered social dating and Play-to-Date features, GoodEgg has become the new darling of the Solana (SOL) community, who are flocking to invest before it’s too late. As the buzz grows, it’s easy to see why this presale looks like a Mexican wave sweeping across the crypto world.
 
Solana’s Whale Sales: A Looming Threat? 
As GoodEgg (GEGG) rises, Solana (SOL) faces turbulence.
